Others: Jackson Chourio is coming off a four-RBI performance in his last game.
The game is scheduled for 7:40 PM ET on BSWI.
Chourio has a hit in 80 of 120 games this year, with multiple base hits in 35 of them.
In 17 of 120 games this season, he has hit a long ball.
In 45.0% of his games this season, Chourio has scored at least a run, and in 11 of those games he recorded two or more runs scored.
In 40 of 120 games this season, he has driven in a run, and 19 of those games included a performance that produced more than one RBI.
Chourio has gone down on strikes one or more times 67 times this year in 120 games played.
Steven Matz will be the starting pitcher for the St. Louis Cardinals.
